name: Oh, Yeah Professor!
description:
My submission for the Salisbury University Independent Game Development Club's Prof Jam 2018.

Made by Nathan Simms

Tackle through walls and teach all of the students before security makes you pay for the damages and stops your from using your impactfully radical teaching methods.

Controls
Move - Arrow Keys
Tackle - Space Bar
Reset - R
Quit - Escape
Toggle Fullscreen - Tab

Theme
High Impact Learning Experience

Tips

  • Students' moods will improve as you teach them. Listen carefully to know how much you've taught a class. You'll know for sure when you've finished a class.
  • The school board is onto you. Every time you finish teaching a class, more guards will appear.
  • Teaching is what keeps your heart and soul going. Fully teach a class and you'll get some health back.
  • Roman History wasn't taught in a day. You can leave a class and come back to it later.

Credits

Music - Rossini's William Tell Overture, Performed by the Philadelphia Orchestra

Voice Acting - Nathan Simms
